job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Do you excel in engineering roles that demand strategic thinking, ownership, and the ability to solve intricate technical problems? As an AI Product Engineer, you'll be at the forefront of developing key product features, guiding its technical trajectory, and ensuring its enduring success. With the power to innovate, your technical decisions will significantly influence both the product and its users.

   You'll be part of a revolutionary learning transformation:
     * TeachTap: Utilizes AI to resurrect historical figures in an engaging, TikTok-inspired learning format.
     * TeachTales: Captivates students with tailored, enchanting stories that enhance understanding.
     * TimeBack: Serves as an educational assistant, seamlessly integrating with current apps to guide students.
     * Athena: Employs AI-generated content to achieve tangible academic results.

   Your role is pivotal in advancing our products' technical capabilities, ensuring they remain scalable, durable, and efficient for years to come. By working closely with product teams, you'll transform abstract requirements into tangible technical frameworks, addressing complex problems while maintaining superior quality. Your choices will shape the future of learning for countless students.

   We emphasize strategic planning and thoughtful design. Our AI-centric approach eliminates routine tasks, allowing you to concentrate on impactful decisions and innovative problem-solving. You'll enjoy significant autonomy, steering product direction and prioritizing its enduring stability and growth.

   If you're prepared to spearhead the technical advancement of our SaaS offerings and harness generative AI to expand horizons, we want to connect with you.

   What you will be doing

     * Feature Development: Crafting and deploying new functionalities with a focus on scalability, sustainability, and lasting product influence.
     * Requirement Engineering: Partnering with product teams to fine-tune requirements and leading technical dialogues to align features with overarching product objectives.
     * Operations and Maintenance: Ensuring product reliability through monitoring, performance optimization, and proactive issue resolution.
     * Technical Design: Making critical technical choices that directly affect user experience and overall product scalability.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Jumping between short-lived projects or following fleeting tech trends.
     * Engaging in internal IT tasks or outsourced projects that lack real-world impact.
     * Getting bogged down in endless meetings or managing tedious infrastructure matters.
job_details.full_text:
AI Product Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Do you excel in engineering roles that demand strategic thinking, ownership, and the ability to solve intricate technical problems? As an AI Product Engineer, you'll be at the forefront of developing key product features, guiding its technical trajectory, and ensuring its enduring success. With the power to innovate, your technical decisions will significantly influence both the product and its users.

   You'll be part of a revolutionary learning transformation:
     * TeachTap: Utilizes AI to resurrect historical figures in an engaging, TikTok-inspired learning format.
     * TeachTales: Captivates students with tailored, enchanting stories that enhance understanding.
     * TimeBack: Serves as an educational assistant, seamlessly integrating with current apps to guide students.
     * Athena: Employs AI-generated content to achieve tangible academic results.

   Your role is pivotal in advancing our products' technical capabilities, ensuring they remain scalable, durable, and efficient for years to come. By working closely with product teams, you'll transform abstract requirements into tangible technical frameworks, addressing complex problems while maintaining superior quality. Your choices will shape the future of learning for countless students.

   We emphasize strategic planning and thoughtful design. Our AI-centric approach eliminates routine tasks, allowing you to concentrate on impactful decisions and innovative problem-solving. You'll enjoy significant autonomy, steering product direction and prioritizing its enduring stability and growth.

   If you're prepared to spearhead the technical advancement of our SaaS offerings and harness generative AI to expand horizons, we want to connect with you.

   What you will be doing

     * Feature Development: Crafting and deploying new functionalities with a focus on scalability, sustainability, and lasting product influence.
     * Requirement Engineering: Partnering with product teams to fine-tune requirements and leading technical dialogues to align features with overarching product objectives.
     * Operations and Maintenance: Ensuring product reliability through monitoring, performance optimization, and proactive issue resolution.
     * Technical Design: Making critical technical choices that directly affect user experience and overall product scalability.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Jumping between short-lived projects or following fleeting tech trends.
     * Engaging in internal IT tasks or outsourced projects that lack real-world impact.
     * Getting bogged down in endless meetings or managing tedious infrastructure matters.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing product features using generative AI, building user-facing applications like chatbots and story generators, and integrating AI into learning platforms. This aligns strongly with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer, focusing on LLMs and generative models to create tangible user experiences.
